Name: New York Graphic Boxy Tee
Reviews: [['', 'I love this shirt! The material is soft, not like viscose but close enough. The print landed right above my boob, it‚Äôs spelled correctly and there‚Äôs no loose strings. When I first saw it I thought to myself ‚Äúwow, this is short‚Äù, but when I put it on it was still okay. In the second picture I am pulling my pants down. As you see, this shirt covers my belly button. So it‚Äôs still a decent length. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô6 /168cm tall. So this shirt will only show your stomach if you‚Äôre a very tall person. This shirt is not see through either which is great. I thought this might not fit me since I sometimes have to buy plus size things, but it fit great!', '4.8'], ['', 'Love love love it! Yellow is such a happy color and this top instantly makes you look lively and bright.I first bought the blue one and liked it so much so I then bought the yellow! I sized up though since I wanted a more oversized fit.', '4.8'], ['', 'I went two sizes bigger because I read that it ran a little small and Im very glad I did! I wanted it to be a little baggier but the cropped-ness is still there:) perfect!', '4.8']]

Name: Heathered Knit Cuffed Sleeve Cropped Tee
Reviews: [['', 'This is a super soft and wonderful basic grey shirt! I love it! For reference Im 34B (88cm/34.6in), 161cm (5 3") Tall, waist 67cm (26in) and I ordered a M. The fabric is nice, and the length is ideal for me. Recommended 100%! I took some measurements of the top.', 'None'], ['', "(ignore my body measurements, they aren't accurate at the time of this review) i'm 97-100 pounds, 5'2 feet, and can typically fit into 32B, 34B, 36B (US size) bras. - just like the photo - comfortable cotton fabric - has decent stretch - the cuff is not stitched into the shirt, it's made where you can roll it up with ease and wear either way i'm not too sure if it would fit well on bigger girls, it might be a bit tight! unless you wanna go for that look, then i could see that being cute. however, shein shirts are returnable, so if you do buy and the one-size doesn't fit how you'd like, no biggie. overall, super versatile and cute. recommend!", 'None'], ['', 'Now my favourite shirt I own. Reviews: [['', 'Keep in mind this shirt is oversized, because it is huge! This isn‚Äôt a problem for me because it is what I wanted, but its soooo soft.', 'None'], ['', 'READ THE REVIEW BEFORE YOU BUY. The description SAYS OVERSIZED TEE. so that‚Äôs what you will get. Literally :). I read the reviews and went with a medium. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô6 and weigh about 140 lbs. I put that the top fits TRUE TO SIZE because it clearly says OVERSIZED. So be aware when choosing your size. If you want a comfy fit. Order your regular size but if you want a more ‚Äúfitted‚Äù look then order a size smaller or maybe even TWO SIZES smaller. The color is really pretty. The color looks a little bit more vibrant in the picture with the model but it‚Äôs probably because of the lighting. I‚Äôm still satisfied with my order. The material is very soft and it‚Äôs not too thin or too thick. It will looks great with some leggings or biker shorts during the summer or even with regular denim shorts. If you decide to order this top I wouldn‚Äôt recommend machine drying I would let it air dry so that the material doesn‚Äôt get ruined. I would definitely recommend. :)', 'None'], ['', 'READ THE REVIEW BEFORE YOU BUY. The description SAYS OVERSIZED TEE. so that‚Äôs what you will get. Literally :). I read the reviews and went with a medium. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô6 and weigh about 140 lbs. I put that the top fits TRUE TO SIZE because it clearly says OVERSIZED. So be aware when choosing your size. If you want a comfy fit. Order your regular size but if you want a more ‚Äúfitted‚Äù look then order a size smaller or maybe even TWO SIZES smaller. The color is really pretty. The color looks a little bit more vibrant in the picture with the model but it‚Äôs probably because of the lighting. I‚Äôm still satisfied with my order. The material is very soft and it‚Äôs not too thin or too thick. It will looks great with some leggings or biker shorts during the summer or even with regular denim shorts. If you decide to order this top I wouldn‚Äôt recommend machine drying I would let it air dry so that the material doesn‚Äôt get ruined. I would definitely recommend. :)', 'None']]
